mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, product.* from ( select * from product order by pro_no desc)product) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page}*10)
mapper.update: update product set pro_readcnt = pro_readcnt+1 where pro_no = #{pro_no}
mapper.insert: insert into product ( pro_no, bus_id, pro_name, stock, pro_content, pro_img, price, pro_readcnt, pro_likecnt, pro_del ) values ( product_seq.NEXTVAL,#{bus_id},#{pro_name},#{stock},#{pro_content}, #{pro_img},#{price},0,0,'n')
